name: breaking_monolith
description: Breaking monolith project to explain the ways and methods of migrating a project to cloud

scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add -f out/ && git commit -m "Deploy breaking_monolith next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages

author: Sakthikannan Subramanian
